name: StardriftR
description:
Gameplay

Hello Pilot. Looks like we've made it into a real mess this time. We seem to be in an infinite loop of time or something, and even death isn't an escape, huh, figures. You need to find a way for us to break free! otherwise, we may be here forever ... we've been stuck a long time now, and I don't think we're quite done yet..

  • You only have 3 lives so try to dodge as many dangers as possible.
  • You can destroy asteroids using your green mining laser.
  • Debris can't be destroyed (unless you use the supercharged red laser). Avoid floating pieces of debris as much as possible.
  • Unlock your supercharged red laser!: by collecting floating spaceship ghosts. These are the locations where other players succumbed to the dangers of space. You might find your own previous ghost as well!
  • Dying will leave a permanent green ghost with your name at your furthest travelled distance for everyone to see. Try and beat everyone elses scores!

Controls

  • W, A, S, D or Keyboard Arrows: Move spaceship around the edges of the screen.
  • Left Mouse button: shoot green mining laser. This can be used to destroy asteroids only! Be careful as prolonged shooting will overheat your ship.
  • Right Mouse button: shoot supercharged red laser. This mega laser will destroy anything it touches, including floating debris.
